# Hero (Domain)
## Overview

**Granted Power:** Once per day, you can add your caster level to a single attack roll.

**Hero Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Divine Favor (Spell)|Divine Favor]]****:** You gain attack, damage bonus, +1/three levels.

**2** **[[Bull's Strength (Spell)|Bullâ€™s Strength]]****:** Subject gains 1d4+1 Str for 1 hr./level.

**3 Protection from Elements:** Absorb 12 damage/level from one kind of energy.

**4** **[[Divine Power (Spell)|Divine Power]]****:** You gain attack bonus, 18 Str, and 1 hp/level.

**5** **[[Righteous Might (Spell)|Righteous Might]]****:** Your size increases, and you gain +4 Str.

**6** **[[Stoneskin (Spell)|Stoneskin]]****:** Stops blows, cuts, stabs, and slashes.

**7** **[[Transformation (Spell)|Transformation]]****:** You gain combat bonuses.

**8** **[[Giant Size (Spell)|Giant Size]]****:** You become Huge or larger.

**9** **[[Shapechange (Spell)|Shapechange]]****:** Transforms you into any creature, and change forms once per round.

**Source:** Oriental Adventures (WotC), pg. 87
